title: x/mobile/audio: audio clicks if PCM data contains a header
body:
PCM files contain a header as it is explained on the PCM wavformat spec [1]. The audio.Player should accept an io.ReadSeeker and try to parse the header to determine the number of channels, bit rate and the sample rate. If we buffer the header directly to the OpenAL backend, it clicks.

[1] http://www.topherlee.com/software/pcm-tut-wavformat.html
